text: Charles Bradley (15 May 1922 – 23 July 1984), also known as Charlie Bradley, was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for York City, in non-League football for York Railway Institute and Scarborough, and played wartime football for York. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:Sportspeople from York Category:1984 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:York Railway Institute A.F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:York City F.C. wartime guest players Category:Association football midfielders
